item.title: Naomi add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Naomi add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is what you read when you don't have to that determines what you will be when you can't help it." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "These woods are lovely, dark and deep, But I have promises to keep, And miles to go before I sleep, And miles to go before I sleep." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Mary Renault
item.description: "To hate excellence is to hate the gods." -- Mary Renault

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Mary Renault
item.description: "The rightness of a thing isn't determined by the amount of courage it takes." -- Mary Renault

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Mary Renault
item.description: "It is better to learn war early from friends, than late from enemies" -- Mary Renault

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Osip Mandelstam
item.description: "I was stopped in the dense Soviet wood by bandits who called themselves my judges." -- Osip Mandelstam

item.title: Naomi add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity." -- Dorothy Parker
